info.title: Amazon EC2 AWS Marketplace API
info.description: The API for management AWS Marketplace

get.summary: Determines whether a product code is associated with an instance.
get.description: Determines whether a product code is associated with an instance.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The product code. This must be a product code that you own.
